title: Vuelta a España: Sepp Kuss cruises in red, with Jesus Herrada a winner from breakaway
content:
The American defends red after a relatively routine day in the saddle: 'We were happy to let the group go for the stage win.'

Read the full article at Vuelta a España: Sepp Kuss cruises in red, with Jesus Herrada a winner from breakaway on Velo.
author: ahood
